entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gros Morne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:43 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Berry Hill 11:30 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -12.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -16.3°C
Wind: NNW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 15 except minus 11 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 early this evening then light near midnight. Low minus 15 except minus 11 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
